p: Children with hepatitis C with persistently elevated serum aminotransferases or those with fibrosis on liver histology should be considered for treatment. Presently available treatments are IFNα or PEG-IFNα and ribavirin. AASLD and NASPGHAN recommend the FDA-approved combination of PEG-IFNα with ribavirin as first-line treatment for children ages 3–17 years [ 148– 153].
